uuid.description: The unique identifier of the event.

itemType.description: The type of object.  In this case, an event.

revision.description: The revision number of the object.  This is used for version management.

slug.description: The machine-name "slug" of the event to use in its canonical URL.

shortDescription.description: The short description of the event.

mediumDescription.description: The medium description of the event.

longDescription.description: The long desciption of the event.

media.description: A list of media objects associated to the series (can be images or videos).

categories.description: A list of Categories taxonomyTerm UUIDs that is associated with this event.

tags.description: A list of the Tags taxonomyTerm UUIDs that is associated with this event.

published.description: A boolean field that identifies whether the event has been published.

links.description: A List of objects containing URL and text title of link associated to the event.

genre.description: A list of genre that is associated with this event.

contentRating.description: The content rating of this event.

unscripted.description: A boolean field that identifies whether the event is unscripted.

syndicated.description: A boolean field that identifies whether the event is syndicated.

channelOriginal.description: A boolean field that identifies whether this event is a channel original.

eventType.description: This identifies the event type of the event.  It can be Movie, Live Event, Web Event, Special, Holiday Special, or Prequel.

programStatus.description: This identifies the status of the event.  It can be Upcoming, In-seasons, Off-Season, Archived, Current, or Classic.

releaseYear.description: This identifies the year the event was released.

relatedSeries.description: A list UUIDs of series related to this event.

castCredit.description: The Uuid of the cast associated with this object.

collection.description: The Unique identifier of events collection.
